label: Submission
quote: Please ensure that the template cells/formulas are visible and unlocked.
short_label: Pricing template cells/formulas must be visible and unlocked

label: Submission
quote: The Contractor shall be responsible for ensuring that the pricing information is submitted correctly and submitted by the proposal due date.
short_label: Submit pricing info correctly and by due date

label: Pricing & Payment
quote: The Quoter shall use the labor rates in their HCATS IDIQ Contract
short_label: Use HCATS IDIQ labor rates for pricing

label: Pricing & Payment
quote: Quoters shall be responsible for quoting the labor categories and hours that best meet the solution they are presenting.
short_label: Quote labor categories/hours to best meet solution

label: Pricing & Payment
quote: Quoters shall use the labor category titles and descriptions included in their specific HCATS IDIQ contract to map to those included in the Government’s SOW
short_label: Map labor category titles/descriptions to SOW
